comments:
When stepping repeatedly I sometimes get the error:

  An internal error occured during: "Step Over".

This happens when 

  org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.actions.setTargets(Object[] elements)

is called before the previously value in fElements has been processed.
Is there a stack trace in the .log file associated with this?

Here is the original exception:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 2005-07-25 15:09:35.54
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Step Over".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.actions.AbstractDebugActionDelegate$DebugRequestJ
ob.run(AbstractDebugActionDelegate.java:144)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)


I also put an Assert in setTargets() and got the following stackbacktrace:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-07-25 15:01:26.898
